xwikidoc.title: LoginMessageTemplate
xwikidoc.content:
(% style="text-transform:uppercase; margin-bottom:0;" %) **You are not logged in.**
(% class="inside disc" style="margin-left:0; font-size:11px; margin-top:0;" %) * If you are already a member of Planète Sankoré, complete the fields below and click "Login" to access your profile. * To create an account, simply click on the "Create a new account" below.
